name: splight
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing splight cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`splight` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/splightplatform/terraform-provider-splight).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing splight cloud resources.
nodejs.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/splightplatform/terraform-provider-splight)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-splight` repo](https://github.com/splightplatform/pulumi-splight/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-splight` repo](https://github.com/splightplatform/terraform-provider-splight/issues).

python.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/splightplatform/terraform-provider-splight)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-splight` repo](https://github.com/splightplatform/pulumi-splight/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-splight` repo](https://github.com/splightplatform/terraform-provider-splight/issues).

statusText.description: optional custom value to be displayed in the platform.

value.description: value to be considered to compare

provider.description:
The provider type for the splight package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

aggregation.description: aggregation to be applied to reads before comparisson

alertItems.description: variables to be calculated for a complex comparisson.

operator.description: operator to be used to compare the read value with the threshold value

relatedAssets.description: related assets to be linked. In case one of these alerts triggers it will be reflected on each of these assets.

targetVariable.description: variable to be used to compare with thresholds

timeWindow.description: window to fetch data from. Data out of that window will not be considered for evaluation
